title: Welcome Message
content: Hello, welcome to our service! We're excited to have you onboard.

title: Update Notification
content: Your account has been updated successfully. Please review the changes in your profile.

title: Reminder
content: Don't forget to check out the new features we just launched. Visit the dashboard to explore more.

title: Support Ticket Reply
content: Your support ticket has been resolved. If you need further assistance, feel free to reach out.

title: New Message
content: You have a new message from the admin team. Please check your inbox.

title: Scheduled Maintenance
content: We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance tomorrow at 2 AM. Services might be disrupted during this time.

title: Promotion Offer
content: Get 20% off on your next subscription renewal. Use code RENEW20.

title: Security Alert
content: A login attempt was made on your account from an unfamiliar device. If this wasn't you, please secure your account.

title: Account Suspension
content: Your account has been temporarily suspended due to suspicious activity. Please contact support for further details.

title: Service Restored
content: The outage earlier today has been resolved. All services are back online.
